sentence.Network_en: Burke cast a cursory glance at the menu, then flapped it shut.
sentence.Network_cn: 伯克匆匆地瞥了一眼菜单，然后啪地合上了。

sentence.Network_en: I gave the letter a fairly cursory reading.
sentence.Network_cn: 我大略地读了一下那封信。

sentence.Network_en: He signed with only a cursory glance at the report.
sentence.Network_cn: 他只草草看了一眼报告就签了名.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin cursorius 'of a runner', from cursor (see cursor)

entry.def: A cursory glance or examination is a brief one in which you do not pay much attention to detail.

example.ex: Burke cast a cursory glance at the menu, then flapped it shut...
example.tran: 伯克匆匆地瞥了一眼菜单，然后啪地合上了。

example.ex: I gave the letter a fairly cursory reading.
example.tran: 我大略地读了一下那封信。

means.word_mean: 1. hasty and without attention to detail; not thorough;

sentences.sentence: "a casual (or cursory) inspection failed to reveal the house's structural flaws"

stems_affixes.word_buile: curs跑,发生,快速做……+ive……的→像跑一样的[书写]
curs跑,发生,快速做……+ory……的→快速做完→粗略的
ex出+curs跑,发生,快速做……+ive……的→思想跑出去→离题的
in进入+curs跑,发生,快速做……+ive……的→跑进来的→侵入的
curs跑,发生,快速做……+or表名词→移动,跑得快→光标,指针

stems_affixes.value_cn: 远足,短途旅行,游览;离题;[物理]偏移,漂移
stems_affixes.word_buile: excurse[v.远足, 短程旅行, 游览]+ion动作或状态→n.远足,短途旅行,游览;离题;[物理]偏移,漂移
in进入+curs跑+ion动作或状态→跑入→侵犯
pre预先+curs跑,发生,快速做……+or人→先跑者→先驱
